byline.contributor: Fazal Muzhary, Jawad Sukhanyar and Ahmad Shakib contributed reporting.

abstract: Demonstrators in northern Afghanistan block highway in protest of raid on village by American troops; raid, which destroyed weapons depot of local strongman, shows that American military is far more engaged in fighting than publicly stated advisory role and still sees significant threat in militants not tied to Al Qaeda or Taliban.
lead_paragraph: The mission Monday morning demonstrated that American troops are engaged beyond their publicly stated role of advising the Afghan forces.

headline.main: Afghans Protest After U.S. Forces Carry Out Raid on Strongman
headline.print_headline: Afghans Protest U.S. Raid on Arms Depot

snippet: The mission Monday morning demonstrated that American troops are engaged beyond their publicly stated role of advising the Afghan forces.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
